ygData.subject: Re: Looking for item
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya Mik, From my knowledge the crude stein comes from the zone into Cazic Thule area s favourite menace, Bouncer Hurd.  He drops it from what I have been
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya Mik,

From my knowledge the crude stein comes from the zone into Cazic Thule
area's favourite menace, Bouncer Hurd. He drops it from what I have been
told. That's all I know.


Taoism Wyndfist
The Rathe.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mikaela [mailto:mikaela@...]
> Sent: October 13, 1999 11:39 AM
> To: EverQuest@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Looking for item
>
>
> From: "Mikaela" <mikaela@...>
>
> I have a crude stein someone gave me, but do not have a clue where it came
> from or how to use it. It says it does minor healing, but I
> don't know how
> to use it. Could someone please give us the run down on this crude stein?
> Is it a single use item, how to use, etc. Thanks so much.
>
> Mik
